Tips.Tip: Want another tip? Type: tip
Want ALL tips? Type: tip -All
Edit your profile, type: t $profile
Want to change the IE home page so it's not RNET ? Put this in your $profile:NEWLINESet-IHIIEHomePage "[url]"
See all special IHI functions, type: ihifunctions
Is Senthil Approved? Type: isa
See help for any command, type: Get-Help [command] -full
See ALL commands defined in memory, type: Get-Command
Decrypt an IHI password, type: Convert-IHIDecryptPassword [encrypted value]
Open the releases folder in Explorer, type: rel
Need to encode or decode HTML? Use these: Convert-IHIHtmlDecode, Convert-IHIHtmlEncode, Convert-IHIUrlDecode, Convert-IHIUrlEncode
Want the XML content in your web.configs and other XML files to be properly formatted? Type: NEWLINEcleanxml C:\IHI_MAIN\trunk\[your application root]
Want to see who is logged into a particular machine? Type: Get-IHITerminalSessions
See if any users are logged into any of the SPRINGS servers, type: getout
Open IE to a particular url, type: ie [url]
See all the values on the Ihi: drive, type: ihidrive
Edit all your application's web configs in diff editors? Type: NEWLINEdifconfigs C:\IHI_MAIN\trunk\[your application root]
Open file in text editor: t [file]NEWLINENEWLINEAlso accepts pipeline input:NEWLINEdir *.txt | t

Search the repository with: search [search term]NEWLINENEWLINEAnd show the text of results with: search [search term] -ShowTextNEWLINENEWLINETo see lots more capabilities and examples: Get-Help search -Full
Open file in PowerShell editor: pse [file]NEWLINENEWLINEAlso accepts pipeline input:NEWLINEdir *.ps1 | pse
Use Invoke-IHISqlCmdFiles to create stored procedures in your databaseNEWLINEGet-Help Invoke-IHISqlCmdFiles -Full
Copy files and folders with Copy-IHIFileRoboCopyNEWLINEGet-Help Copy-IHIFileRoboCopy -Full
Send email easy: Send-IHIMailMessage recipient@ihi.org "message subject" "message body"NEWLINELots more features: Get-Help Copy-IHIFileRoboCopy -Full
Extract files from zip and other compressed file types with Expand-IHIArchive
Compare local repository copy of web.configs with copies on Production App Server type Compare-IHIProdWebConfigsLocal
Compare local repository copy of SPRINGS configs with copies on www.ihi.org type Compare-IHIProdSpringsConfigsLocal
See list of applications to build or deploy, type by itself: build
Need help with building an application? Type: build -help
Build an application: build [application]
Build a specific version of an application: build [application] [version]
Need help with deploying an application? Type: deploy -help
Deploy an application: deploy [application] [version] [server nickname]
See what versions of an application are deployed: version [application]
See multiple applications' version info: version [application1],[application2],...
See version information for all applications (takes awhile): version ALL
See version information in a sortable, filterable grid: version [application] -GridView
Are you a lazy typist? Me too - so use tab completion when using build, deploy, version or apphistory.
Sublime is the best text editor, ever.
Want to know if a stored procedure is structured correctly: Test-IHIStoredProcedureStructure
Need to change your svn repository password: changepw
To see windows updates use the following cmdlet: Get-HotFix -Description Update, or winupdates
Set your credential once so you don't need to do it again within a PowerShell session: $cred = Get-IHICredential
Use SQL a lot? If you need to find the existing Server Name use: SELECT @@SERVERNAME AS 'Server Name'
Did you know PowerShell has a Lorem Ipsum cmdlet? Type: lorem
Need to know what versions of a specific app have been installed on a server? Type: apphistory [application] [server]
Need an excuse as to why something failed? Try the BOFH Excuse Generator, Type: Get-Excuse or excuse
Need to reomtely login to a SharePoint machine as yourself? Try: Enter-PSSession -ComputerName [SPADM_SERVER] -ConfigurationName SPRINGS -Authentication CredSSP -Credential (Get-IHICredential)
